title: Sensor Setup
description: An installation and configuration of a sensor on a platform during a mission, to observe a specific variable. One setup = one sensor + one variable.

sensorSetupId.description: Internal identifier for the sensor setup.

observesVariable.description: The variable this sensor setup is intended to measure.

usesSensor.description: The sensor that was configured for this sensor setup.

hostPlatform.description: The platform on which the sensor was installed.

partOfMission.description: The mission in which this sensor setup was used.

startTime.description: Time when the sensor setup became active.

endTime.description: Time when the sensor setup was deactivated or removed.
